{{DISPLAYTITLE:Adeptal Mirror}}
{{SereniteaPotTabs}}
The '''Adeptal Mirror''' has missions for the [[Serenitea Pot]] that give [[Furnishing Blueprints]] and [[Furnishings]]. It works similarly to the [[Adventurer Handbook]]. The Adeptal Mirror is accessed from the [[File:Icon Adeptal Mirror.png|30px]] icon. There are only 4 chapters of the Adeptal Mirror.

The Adeptal Mirror cannot be accessed once the 4 chapters are completed.
